title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: When performing a SaveAs operation in the software, the file type is not being remembered properly. Additionally, the icon associated with the file changes from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
EB: The file type should be remembered correctly after performing the SaveAs operation. The icon associated with the file should not change from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file.
3) Click the SaveAs icon next to the Save icon.
4) A dialog should appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Enter the filename without the extension.
7) Click Ok.
8) Verify that the file is added to the specified location with the proper file extension in the Navigator.
